title: Rollup adds $0 to undefined
body:
https://rollupjs.org/repl?version=0.61.0&

If `undefined` is used in multiple modules, it is renamed to undefined$0 with a number after the dollar sign to avoid naming collisions. In this case though, undefined should not be renamed.

This bug was introduced in `v0.61.0`, we didn't have this problem in `v0.60.7`
